channel.title: Hackers Hacked my Server, Help!
channel.description:
I just finished hosting my first server, and a couple of minutes in someone logged in and started spamming
"YOUR SERVER IS UNDER ATTACK! PLEASE REMAIN CALM!"
As he was doing that he was creating a load of accounts, the same name but a different number at the end. It went up to 70 then i finally ended up IP banning him.
Thats not all... A couple of more minutes later, someone CHANGED their character rights to 3 ( Owner ) and his brothers ( Same IP in the character logs )
He demoted me, then IP banned me... WTF??
What do i do now?.... I cant log in, un-ban myself or anything.. I think i need a new source or re-install right?
Can anyone tell me what i have to do so that doesn't happen again? Thanks.

item.title: Hackers Hacked my Server, Help!
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:9, topic:245830”][quote author=Xile Maizez link=topic=322304.msg2547580#msg2547580 date=1227375399]
I just finished hosting my first server, and a couple of minutes in someone logged in and started spamming

“YOUR SERVER IS UNDER ATTACK! PLEASE REMAIN CALM!”

As he was doing that he was creating a load of accounts, the same name but a different number at the end. It went up to 70 then i finally ended up IP banning him.

Thats not all… A couple of more minutes later, someone CHANGED their character rights to 3 ( Owner ) and his brothers ( Same IP in the character logs )

He demoted me, then IP banned me… WTF??

What do i do now?.. I cant log in, un-ban myself or anything…
I think i need a new source or re-install right?

Can anyone tell me what i have to do so that doesn’t happen again? Thanks.
[/quote]
My, your server sucks.[/quote]

His server doesn’t suck dude…And you’re not getting hacked…The problem is IF you downloaded a pre-made source and you edited it and made stuff and such…The original guy who coded that server and released probably put in his client.java that when a certain name (his name) logs onto that server, his char rights automatically go to 3. I use an allstarscape source and the original guy who coded it his name was Mod Allstar…If that name logged on he would automatically be made owner. I ip banned him and removed from the client.java where if he logs on it gives him owner rights.

EDIT: You don’t have to get rid of the source because some nerd is pushing you to do it…Push HIM out of the server.

Read full topic

What do i do now?.. I cant log in, un-ban myself or anything…
I think i need a new source or re-install right?

My, your server sucks.

item.title: Hackers Hacked my Server, Help!
item.dc:creator: @xyzz123 xyzz123
item.description:
@xyzz123 wrote:

I’d just add something in the code to automatically disconnect any player with that IP every update loop. I could write some code for that. What server are you using?

Read full topic

item.title: Hackers Hacked my Server, Help!
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“Xile Maizez, post:6, topic:245830”]Lol im new to this stuff, I have some idea what im doing but im sometimes

Well, thanks for the help, i hope by setting it to “Read only” They wont be able to change their Rights and stuff lol…[/quote]

they can’t change anything unless they have the files locally…and are compiling it and running it.

Read full topic

item.description:

Lol im new to this stuff, I have some idea what im doing but im sometimes

item.title: Hackers Hacked my Server, Help!
item.dc:creator: @firewithin3 firewithin3
item.description:
@firewithin3 wrote:

Find his ip, put it in the ipban file and unban everyone else, make the file read-only, and you’re done.

[quote=“Xile Maizez, post:4, topic:245830”]Well, i dont really care about that server anymore =. I threw it into the recycling bin lmao… Getting a new source… Right now all i care is how to make sure it doesn’t happen again.

Also there were absolutely NO ip’s in any of the IPbanlogs, banlogs, kickedlogs or anything. I’ve compiled and compiled and ran… New names and everything. I dont know what the hell he did but he’s good lmao…[/quote]Either that, or you’re bad.

Read full topic

item.title: Hackers Hacked my Server, Help!
item.dc:creator: @Xile_Maizez Xile Maizez
item.description:
@Xile_Maizez wrote:

Well, i dont really care about that server anymore =. I threw it into the recycling bin lmao… Getting a new source… Right now all i care is how to make sure it doesn’t happen again.

Also there were absolutely NO ip’s in any of the IPbanlogs, banlogs, kickedlogs or anything. I’ve compiled and compiled and ran… New names and everything. I dont know what the hell he did but he’s good lmao…

Read full topic

item.title: Hackers Hacked my Server, Help!
item.dc:creator: @xyzz123 xyzz123
item.description:
@xyzz123 wrote:

Best thing to do when this happens is to pull the server offline. Remember, you have more power over the server than they do, because you have all of the data files locally, plus the source.

In addition to what X Screech X said, you can also modify your source so that it automatically kicks anyone with his IP. That might be a good thing to do, since it is already compiled into the source, and therefore unmodifiable.

Read full topic

item.title: Hackers Hacked my Server, Help!
item.dc:creator: @X_Screech_X X Screech X
item.description:
@X_Screech_X wrote:

Ok, go to your folder of all the characters. Then you will see his Ip. Right? Copy is and go back to the Data folder in your main server folder. Go to BannedIps and un-Ip ban everyone there. Just erase everything in there. Then paste the IP that you just copied. Save it, restart your server.

Read full topic
